Uses of Package
alp.core

Packages that use alp.core
alp.algorithms Contains algorithms for many utilities. 
alp.components All available compiler components. 
alp.core Specifies the interfaces for and capabilities of the component and signal classes. 
alp.parser Contais the command line runner class for ALP compiler 
alp.parser.graph Contais the command line runner class for ALP compiler 
alp.parser.lang Contais the command line runner class for ALP compiler 
 

Classes in alp.core used by alp.algorithms

          An implementation of ComponentInterface.
Design
          A hardware design which consists of an Component set and an Signal set.

          A generalized component.

          An intermediate component.
IOComponent
          An Input/Output component.
